pokerapp

Class Deck

  • Object
    • Deck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Card>

    public class Deck
extends Object
implements Iterable<Card>
    builds a deck of cards for pokerapp and allows operations on the deck.
    Author:
    Tony, Sam, Ari, Steve Date: 22/02/13 Time: 19:53

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static ArrayList<Card> allCards

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Deck createDeck()
      creates a pokerapp deck
      Iterator<Card> iterator() 
      Card pop()
      pops a card off the deck
      void returnToBottom(Card card)
      returns a card to the bottom of the deck
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles a deck of cards (we used collections.shuffle() because it's Fisher-Yates, and really we aren't going to get much better randomness with what we have available)

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createDeck

        public static Deck createDeck()
        creates a pokerapp deck
        Returns:
        the deck

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffles a deck of cards (we used collections.shuffle() because it's Fisher-Yates, and really we aren't going to get much better randomness with what we have available)

      • pop

        public Card pop()
        pops a card off the deck
        Returns:
        the removed card

      • returnToBottom

        public void returnToBottom(Card card)
        returns a card to the bottom of the deck
        Parameters:
        card - the card you want to return to the bottom of deck

      • iterator

        public Iterator<Card> iterator()
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface Iterable<Card>
        Returns:
        an iterator through the deck
